page.title: 07Employment
page.content: Employment is strongly influenced by the rural surroundings, those working in it, or those who wish to return to its tranquility after working in town. A large number of houses have small holdings attached. These are commonly used for horses or turned into alottments for personal use or for neighbours to rent. The majority of people work in the surrounding villages or towns and some commute to {London }via the{M4}or by train from {Reading.}Local occupations include {publicans, gardeners, farm workers}or {farmers, milk rounds, gamekeepers, {building and maintenance contractors and{garage mechanics.}The more professional occupations in the area include{commercial air line pilots, two{M.Ps}(one local and the other of a constituency in Lincolnshire ), and a {deputy editor}of a Fleet St paper.
